channel.title: Help
channel.description: im running a server on my computer and i can start up client and log in and connect fine but then i go to my sisters computer and i type in my ip and its not working and yes the ip is correct , so i connect to linksys internet instead of my 2wire and then it works but linksys is 2 slow and lags so how can i log into the server with my sisters comp cuz its not working

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

Are you using your ##.###.####.#### ip address or your no-ip address?If it’s no-ip, you need “No-ip DUC” running and need to portforward

Read full topic
